label: ZWA008
info_overview: Aeotec Door/ Window Sensor 7 is a small window position sensor for your smart home, it monitors window and their exact opening position and lets your know when a window is tilted or completely opened. It also supports connecting external binary sensors through the dry binary contact of the Door/ Window sensor.

parameters.label: Sensor Operation Mode
parameters.description: Defines if internal magnet sensor or the external terminal input is detected
parameters.overview: This parameter defines if the internal magnet sensor or the external terminal input is detected and used to issue alarm notification. There is always one input active only. The other sensor input the deactivated.

parameters.label: Sensor State Polarity
parameters.description: Defines the polarity of the magnet sensor

parameters.label: Visual LED Indications
parameters.description: Defines when the red LED will indicate events.
parameters.overview:
Disabling all indications may extend battery life.

Setting Description
Byte 1: 00000001Â  No Indications
Byte 1: 00000010Â  Open/Close Status ChangeÂ 
Byte 1: 00000100Â  Wake UpÂ 
Byte 1: 00010000 Device TamperingÂ

parameters.label: Range Test after double click
parameters.description: Allows to enable the activation of a Z-Wave range.
parameters.overview: Allows to enable the activation of a Z-Wave range test with double clicking the tamper switch.

parameters.label: 2nd Association Group Trigger
parameters.description: Sending a BASIC command to all devices of Association Group 2
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the status of the magnet switch that causes sending a BASIC command to all devices of Association Group 2

parameters.label: Command Sent to Devices of Association Group 2
parameters.description: This parameter defines which commands is sent to 2nd Association Group

parameters.label: BASIC command value sent to 2nd Assoc Group on On
parameters.description: BASIC command value sent to 2nd Association Group on âOnâ event

parameters.label: BASIC command value sent to 2nd Assoc Group on Off
parameters.description: BASIC command value sent to 2nd Association Group on âOffâ event

parameters.label: Time Delay of âOnâ command frame
parameters.description: Time Delay of âOnâ command frame

parameters.label: Time Delay of âOffâ command frame
parameters.description: Time Delay of âOffâ command frame

associations.label: Group 2
associations.description: Control devices when magnet or external dry contacts trips

associations.label: Group 3
associations.description: Sends alarm message when magnet controlled or external dry sensor trips.

associations.label: Group 4
associations.description: Sends alarm messages when tamper is tripped

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.

xml.xml:
Overview

Aeotec Door/ Window Sensor 7 is a small window position sensor for your smart home, it monitors window and their exact opening position and lets your know when a window is tilted or completely opened. It also supports connecting external binary sensors through the dry binary contact of the Door/ Window sensor.


Inclusion Information

Tripple click the tamper switch


Exclusion Information

Tripple click the tamper switchÂ 


Wakeup Information

Hit the tamper switch once.

]]> Sensor COMMAND_CLASS_SENSOR_BINARY COMMAND_CLASS_CENTRAL_SCENE COMMAND_CLASS_ALARM;type=ACCESS_CONTROL COMMAND_CLASS_ALARM;type=BURGLAR COMMAND_CLASS_BATTERY Aeotec Limited ZWA008 0371 0002:0007,0102:0007 1065 setVersion=2 1 setup link

Overview

This parameter defines if the internal magnet sensor or the external terminal input is detected and used to issue alarm notification. There is always one input active only. The other sensor input the deactivated.

]]> 0 Defines the polarity of the magnet sensor 0

Overview

Disabling all indications may extend battery life.

Setting Description
Byte 1: 00000001Â  No Indications
Byte 1: 00000010Â  Open/Close Status ChangeÂ 
Byte 1: 00000100Â  Wake UpÂ 
Byte 1: 00010000 Device TamperingÂ 
]]> 7

Overview

Allows to enable the activation of a Z-Wave range test with double clicking the tamper switch.

]]> 0

Overview

This parameter defines the status of the magnet switch that causes sending a BASIC command to all devices of Association Group 2

]]> 0 This parameter defines which commands is sent to 2nd Association Group 2 BASIC command value sent to 2nd Association Group on âOnâ event 255 BASIC command value sent to 2nd Association Group on âOffâ event 0 Time Delay of âOnâ command frame 0 Time Delay of âOffâ command frame 0 Delay of Tamper Alarm Cancellation 0 Reporting Tamper Alarm Cancellation 1 Central Scene Event Functionality 0 Tilt Sensor Functionality 1 50 100 high sensitivity, 1 very low. The default is 50. 5 Control devices when magnet or external dry contacts trips 5 Sends alarm message when magnet controlled or external dry sensor trips. 5 Sends alarm messages when tamper is tripped 5 true
